name: spooty
description: Spooty is a self-hosted request and metadata dashboard for Spotify-linked media libraries, helping manage playlists and discover tracks for local collections.
features: Spotify integration: Connects to Spotify for playlist and track data.
Request system: Allows users to request songs for local music library.
Playlist syncing: Syncs Spotify playlists to local collection.
Track metadata: Fetches detailed information about requested tracks.
Download coordination: Coordinates with download tools for music acquisition.
Duplicate detection: Avoids requesting songs already in library.
User management: Handles multiple users with individual request histories.
Request queue: Manages pending requests with priority ordering.
Approval workflow: Requires admin approval for requests before processing.
Statistics: Displays most requested artists and tracks.
Web interface: Manages requests through browser-based dashboard.
API access: Integrates with music management tools via REST API.
